name: TeleJelly
overview: Log in to Jellyfin using Telegram
description: Enables logging in to Jellyfin using the Telegram Login Widget as SSO provider. Allows for simple Group management. Having a Telegram Username is mandatory. A Telegram Bot is required to validate the Telegram login credentials. A valid, public domain SSL certificate is required for the Login Widget to work. This plug-in is free, open-source software. 'Production'-usage is NOT recommended. I do not accept any responsibility for errors. Repo: https://github.com/hexxone/TeleJelly
